entry.title: CDMedallionView
entry.content:
I “released” a small OS X component today called CDMedallionView. It is a subclass of NSImageView which has been styled to look like the image view on the login screen of OS X Lion (and newer).

It should work on OS X 10.6 and up and it supports retina screens. To build the source you need ARC (must at least be enabled for the CDMedallionView.m file).

You can get it from the GitHub project rastersize/CDMedallionView where you can also create issues and pull requests if you find any problems or opportunity to improve. The code is available under the MIT license. See the license file for more information.
